channel.title: R on Alfredo's Sandbox
channel.description: Recent content in R on Alfredo's Sandbox

item.title: TEZ UP YOUR RODBC HIVE QUERIES
Ode to R, Happy 25th Birthday
item.description: As R turns 25 years old this year, I thought it would only be appropriate to thank the creators of R, Ross Ihaka and Robert Gentleman, as well as the R global community for changing my life. I started learning R in 2014 because I was tired at how SAS had become like a curmudgeon old monopoly rather than a true innovator. But I guess that is what happens to companies with a first mover advantage; they get complacent and feel invincible.

item.title: Building a Holiday Package with timeDate
item.description: Coming Soon Introduction It has been a while since my last post. You can probably imagine why with all that is going on in the world these days. Today I will talk about using the timeDate package to build custome dates for any project. Data Problem In my work to build time series models I need to account for the seasonality that occurs in retail. I discovered the timeDate package from another team at work.
